thread.section_title: New York Hilton Midtown - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Business travelb- 3 nights stay
thread.title_full: Business travelb- 3 nights stay - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: easytravellerRoma
title: Business travelb- 3 nights stay
text:
Great hotel. Very clean and updated rooms. I will stay here again and again.
Breakfast spread is awesome too. HerbNKitchen has a limited selection but all at high quality. That goes a long way when everything available is top notch.
The fitness center is really large. Over 40 cardio stations and a large area for plyometric and large area for weights. Best friends center in NYC vs W, Waldorf, Intercontinental, Marriott, and Sheraton.
